title: 10 Chest No Blueprints. GG.
body: So I literally just bought 10 augmented caches and got 22 Project Core material and no blueprints. Do I recommend buying them? No. But I came here to see how to get the border for Ashe, or is that purely luck based to. Lol.

replies.body: The blue prints are available as a seperate item through the store.  They will be available through the accessories section and named Decrypter Icon, EMA Caster Icon, and Hyper Edge Icon for 75RP/750IP.  We also have a a[ project guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ#h3)and [megathread ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E2ArVn9s-project-holy-shit-theres-a-lot-going-on-lets-break-this-down)with more information on this event.  I hope that helps!
- Yea I got the border. Just thought that I would get something more than 21 skin shards lol...

Buy the three caches purchasable with IP (or RP) for the blueprints.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E2ArVn9s-project-holy-shit-theres-a-lot-going-on-lets-break-this-down
